mapper.select: select * from f_feedReply order by fr_re_group desc, fr_re_step asc where feed_num=#{feed_num}
mapper.insert: insert into f_feedReply values(f_feedReply_seq.nextval, #{fr_re_group}, #{fr_re_step}, #{fr_re_level}, #{feed_num}, #{mem_num}, #{fr_content}, 0, sysdate, #{fr_open}, default)
mapper.update: update f_feedReply set fr_content=#{fr_content}, fr_open=#{fr_open} where fr_num=#{fr_num}
update f_feed set feed_report=#{feed_report} where feed_num=#{feed_num}
